
### networkD3

[networkD3](http://christophergandrud.github.io/networkD3/) provides tools for creating D3 JavaScript network graphs from R. It supports force directed networks, Sankey diagrams, and Reingold-Tilford tree network.

```{r, fig.height=5}
library(networkD3)
data(MisLinks)
data(MisNodes)
forceNetwork(Links = MisLinks, Nodes = MisNodes, Source = "source",
             Target = "target", Value = "value", NodeID = "name",
             Group = "group", opacity = 0.4)
```
